title: We’re throwing a sale
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414120456im_/http:/typophile.com/files/flag_4823.png)
  
_Fredrik Meltzer’s original design proposal for the Norwegian flag, drawn in 1821. According to the myths, it was drawn by his twelve year old son._

**Hipp hipp hurra!** It’s the 17th of May, and we’re throwing a surprise sale to celebrate the Norwegian constitution day. Get 17% off on any purchase with the coupon code “pølser”. Have a mouthful on [www.monokrom.no](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414120456/https:/monokrom.no/)

But wait, there’s more: You can now compose custom bundles combining fonts within and across families. Any purchase with three or more items is eligble for a bundle discount.

Hold on! We’re not done yet. Do you need to upgrade a license? The old one is now automatically deducted in the checkout.

Puh. Time for some sausages.
author: Frode Bo Helland

comments.content: And if you’re an old customer, make sure you check your inbox first. We’ve got a little surprise for you.
The sale is open until midnight in Alaska. You have a little less then twelve hours left.
